description: React component 'MoviesList' that displays a list of movies with real-time updates from a database, allows editing titles inline, and supports deletion. It manages state, subscriptions, and interactions with backend services.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a movie by ID, updates local state optimistically, and handles errors.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Sets the current movie for inline editing.

methods.name: saveEdit
methods.description: Saves the edited movie title, updates backend, and reverts state on error.
